text: E nguazimɨn averpenimɨn aven ikiavɨra ikia, egha e osɨmtɨziba atera navim bigha ara iti. Ezɨ da e gamima e uan nivafɨzir ghurir kam ataghraghasa puvatɨ. E nivafɨzir igiar aghuim a gisɨn aneghuasa ifonge, mati e korotiar igiam ghurim gisɨn anerughtɨma, anagapazagh ganganir bar aghuim damuam. Tuavir kamɨn en nivafɨzir ovengamim, a ua iraghɨrɨgh, egh nivafɨzir angamra ikɨvɨra ikiamim mɨn otogham.
